mapper.select:
select id,type,status,activityTime,title,LEFT(summary,100) as summary,LEFT(content,100) as content from js_activity_offline
1=1
and instr(title,#{title})
and status = #{status}
and date_format(openDayDate,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(openDayDate,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by id desc
limit #{offset},#{limit}

select count(1) from js_activity_offline jao
1=1
and instr(jao.title,#{title})
and status = #{status}
and date_format(jao.addtime,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(jao.addtime,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO js_activity_extend_pic ( extendId, type, status, imgUrl, showSort, addDate) VALUES ( #{extendId}, #{type}, 1, #{imgUrl}, #{showSort}, now());
mapper.delete: delete from js_activity_extend_pic where extendId = #{extendId} and type = #{type}
